title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL

items.title: Rudy Giuliani Is Hurt in Car Crash in New Hampshire
items.description: Mr. Giuliani, the former New York City mayor and lawyer for President Trump, suffered a fractured vertebra, his head of security said.

items.title: Already Pardoned by Trump, Jan. 6 Rioters Push for Compensation
